QuestData.Title: Nightmare
QuestData.Description: Iso'rath's brain is revealed! The shaman you've saved should keep you somewhat safe amidst his defenses.$B$BStrike at the brain and destroy Iso'rath!
QuestData.RewardText: You saved many of my closest allies today, $n. I can only imagine what horrors you witnessed within Iso'rath, but you have the thanks of all of the Earthen Ring.
